description: Implement autonomous documentation and spec-driven development system
author: Master Workflow 3.0

steps.name: Analyze Current Project Structure
steps.prompt: Analyze the current project at {{project_path}} and identify all components, dependencies, patterns, and gaps. Focus on the Queen Controller, intelligence engines, and existing documentation.

steps.name: Implement Project Analyzer Component
steps.prompt: Implement the Project Analyzer class from the autonomous documentation system. Include deep codebase analysis, component detection, dependency mapping, and pattern recognition capabilities.

steps.name: Implement Documentation Generator
steps.prompt: Implement the Documentation Generator class that can automatically create comprehensive API documentation, architecture guides, and setup instructions.

steps.name: Implement Specification Engine
steps.prompt: Implement the Specification Engine for generating technical specifications, system requirements, and integration specs.

steps.name: Implement Interactive Installer
steps.prompt: Implement the Interactive Installer that provides intelligent guided setup and configuration decisions.

steps.name: Implement Implementation Planner
steps.prompt: Implement the Implementation Planner for creating phased project plans, task breakdown, and resource allocation.

steps.name: Create Main Autonomous System Entry
steps.prompt: Create the main index.js file for the autonomous system that orchestrates all components and provides both autonomous and interactive modes.

steps.name: Integrate with Queen Controller
steps.prompt: Integrate the autonomous documentation system with the existing Queen Controller for seamless operation and resource sharing.

steps.name: Test Autonomous System
steps.prompt: Create comprehensive tests for the autonomous documentation system including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

steps.name: Run Autonomous Analysis
steps.description: Execute the autonomous documentation system on the current project

steps.name: Generate Implementation Plan for Original Features
steps.description: Use the autonomous system to create detailed implementation plans for Work Stealing, Circuit Breaker, and other original features
